thread.title: Protesters plan to crash Trump’s Tyngsborough party
thread.title_full: Protesters plan to crash Trump’s Tyngsborough party

title: Protesters plan to crash Trump’s Tyngsborough party
text: Previous -- of -- Next Trump partnered with the Hyatt corporation to buy the Commodore Hotel next to Grand Central Station, which is now known as the Grand Hyatt Hotel. Trump also paid to revamp the station in the 1970s. When the renovation was complete, he hung a giant banner that said “Trump” accross the scaffolding. Mario Tama / Getty Images Trump had the opportunity to buy the Patriots in 1988, but he turned down the opportunity because he didn’t think it was a good investment. The team is now worth more than $2 billion. Jim Davis / The Boston Globe Trump won a Razzie Award for worst supporting actor in the film “Ghosts Can’t Do It” in 1990. He was playing himself in the movie. Andrew H. Walker / Getty Images Previous -- of -- Next In a divorce deposition, Ivana Trump claimed that Donald Trump had raped her while the two were married. She later softened the statement, saying that it was “not in the criminal sense.” Donald Trump’s attorney recently said there is no such thing as marital rape, even though it is explicitly against the law. File Photo Previous -- of -- Next Trump has said he is a strong supporter of the Second Amendment, and that he wants to limit some restrictions on guns. When asked about the guns that he owns, he told an NBC reporter that it’s “none of her business.” Richard Ellis / Getty Images
